title: Polyesters | Reliance Industries Limited
description: Reliance is the largest producer of polyester fibre and yarn in the world. Products include Recron® Staple Fibre & Tow, Recron® Fibrefill, Recron® 3S - Fibres for Reinforcement, Recron® Certified, polyester filament yarn.
keywords: polyesters, recron® staple fibre & tow, recron® fibrefill, recron® 3s, fibres for reinforcement, recron® certified, polyester filament yarn, petrochemical companies in india
